I am 32 years old when writing this review. I have been playing Counter Strike ever since it was just a small mod for HL back in 1998 or 1999. I had so much fun playing all the different versions and also Global Offensive was fun for a few years. Sadly this seems to be the end of CS:GO since the devs or whoever decided to make it F2P never understood how to keep a community alive. My problem with this game now is that even if you had hackers and all that before it went f2p at least not everyone had it, now any moron can get it buy or make some hacks and play, and also the older players are able to just create some new accounts and smurf the lower ranks...the problem is that it ruins the experience of other players, I don't have a full team to play with , I play soloq, I get kicked if I have a bad day, I get flamed on if I speak nice or if I start telling someone what to do. The new generation of players are shit and they don't care if we have the 10 years badge the idea of matchmaking is terrible and I am going to stop playing, like many others. The game is dying ... sadly.
AWESOME and Fantastic and Mind Blowing Game

Yeah, it's CS:GO so it's hard, but that's what is so fun about it. It's rewarding to accomplish something so difficult. Runs great on older computers, so if you can't play those new games coming out every year, this is the game for you. Whatever you do just remember to have some patience with the game, it's not easy, so don't expect it to be. All around a fun game, especially with friends. You can play super competitively, or just casually, there are no rules, just have fun. 10/10 would recommend

可能是真的到了退坑的时候了，还是挺舍不得这款FPS游戏的
十年的CS经历，从1.6到蛋拐再到这，将近5年的CSGO，似乎从来没有玩过其它类型的竞技网游
我把我所有的精力放在FPS上，放在CSGO上
每天的练枪，BOT，死斗都要打很久，跑图道具也是经常练习
可是这样的环境确实是太让人“失望”，无论是平台还是官匹，看不懂的东西越来越多
游戏玩家的素质日益低下，让报点都有些胆怯，害怕被队友多骂一句。让走路都开始变得小心，因为怕卡了队友身位队友大发雷霆。每把都仔细架枪，可难免有时架不住，队友又开始唉声叹气而不是相互鼓励。
不上升主题，只希望我所奋斗的喜欢的FPS，喜欢的CSGO能够在未来发展得更好
我确实是有点疲乏了，再见CSGO。。。
